title: "Google open-sources Tapas, a natural language AI for analyzing relational data"
excerpt: "Google LLC has released the code for Tapas, an internally developed artificial intelligence that can take a natural language question such as “What’s the name of the latest iPhone?” and fetch the answer from a relational database or spreadsheet."
